Title: Single Leaf of an Outdoor Scene in the Safavid Style
Description: This painting, Walters manuscript leaf W.812, was executed in the late 13th century AH/AD 19th in either India or Iran. It is based on a Safavid manuscript painting of the early 11th century AH/AD 17th.
CreditLine: Gift of Robert and Linda Goldman, 1986
Keywords: Indian; Islamic; Persian; Safavid; Illustration; Manuscript; Painting; India; Iran
Provenance: Robert and Linda Goldman [date and mode of acquisition unknown]; Walters Art Museum, 1986, by gift.
Creator: Iranian (?)
